tool_description: Extracts and parses metadata from DICOM radiographic files including patient information, acquisition parameters, and technical details.

dicom_file_path.description: Full path to the DICOM image file

metadata_level.description: Level of detail for metadata extraction (basic, detailed, complete)

error_messages: File not found: The specified DICOM file path does not exist.
Invalid DICOM format: File is not a valid DICOM format or is corrupted.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to read the DICOM file.
Unsupported DICOM version: DICOM file version not supported.
Invalid metadata level: Must be basic, detailed, or complete.
usage: Provide dicom_file_path to the target DICOM file. Optionally specify metadata_level for the amount of detail required.

acquisition_parameters.description: Technical parameters used during image acquisition

image_properties.description: Image dimensions, bit depth, and format details

equipment_info.description: Imaging equipment manufacturer and model information

study_details.description: Study date, time, and description information

raw_metadata.description: Complete list of DICOM tags and values
